betterquesting:10.desc:8:
The twilight horde is strange...they hold incredible power, and most of the beings I have encountered are naturally able to warp space, just as easily it would be for me to lift my hand.
I am truly fighting against higher dimensional beings!
Even their 'world' appears to exist in higer dimensions.
Yet, most of their 'soldiers' are no smarter than sheeps...
I defeated the ruler of the Eden Isles, yet, at the moment, I do not have the power to delve deeper into the world of the Horde...
